sentence.Network_en: The river flows northeastward to the gulf.
sentence.Network_cn: 这条河朝着东北方向流向海湾.

sentence.Network_en: Prince Rupprecht larch will expand northeastward about 280 kilometers in 2050 yr , and more 470 km in 2100 yr.
sentence.Network_cn: 华北落叶松在2050年向东北方向推进280km;2100年继续推进470km左右.

sentence.Network_en: The northeastward Xiangshui fault zone in this area is the main rock - control and ore control structure.
sentence.Network_cn: 区内北东向响水断裂带是主要的控岩和控矿构造.
